about_the_game:
Design and build your own medieval tavern!


Build a tavern from the ground up in any way you imagine it! It can be a classy place meant to serve kings or a restaurant which specializes in great food.

Optimize your seating arrangement to allow your staff to be as fast as possible, upgrade and expand to attract even more patrons and spread your business.

In order to keep your customers happy you will need to have enough food and drinks at all times, efficient staff, great decorations and proper lights. Combine all of that with your imagination and your tavern might be the best in the kingdom!

Features:

  • Buy tables and benches so your guests have a place to sit down
  • Place lights so every seat is well lit
  • Buy different types of drinks which can be served to guests
  • Hire bartenders to fill drinks and waitresses to serve them
  • Buy decorations to make more people come to your tavern
  • Upgrade your tavern by researching new features
  • Build a kitchen and hire a chef to serve food
  • Choose the good salary for your staff or otherwise their mood goes down

"Tavern Master - Prologue" is only the beginning part of the full game "Tavern Master". When the full game releases you will be able to schedule special events, build hotel rooms, hire unlimited staff, build multiple floors and much more! Make sure to wishlist Tavern Master on Steam to get notified when it releases.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.5 Leopard
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 3.06Ghz or better (Intel Core i5 2.66Ghz or better recommended)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 120 series or higher / ATI RADEON HD 4670 series or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Tavern Master is all about managing your medieval tavern. You start with a very small room, couple of benches and tables and build your way up to a huge successful tavern with a kitchen, rooms for guests, group of loyal staff and much more!
